docs.title: Akshay Singh
docs.text: I'm a Data Scientist with a passion for solving real-world problems using AI, NLP, and MLOps.

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
• Resume Analyzer: Parses resumes, extracts entities using spaCy/BERT, ranks candidates.
  • YouTube Downloader: GUI app using pytube and aria2c.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text: Email: akshaysingh.nith@gmail.com GitHub: akshaynith

docs.title: Resume Analyzer
docs.text: An intelligent tool to parse, extract, and analyze resumes for automated screening and shortlisting of candidates.

docs.title: ✨ Project Overview
docs.text: The Resume Analyzer is an end-to-end system that: - Parses resumes (PDF/DOCX) - Extracts structured information using NLP - Classifies or ranks candidates based on job-fit - Exposes results via web interface or API

docs.title: ✅ Resume Parsing
docs.text:
• [ ] Support for PDF, DOCX, and TXT
  • [ ] Convert documents to raw text
  • [ ] Extract sections like "Education", "Experience", "Skills"

docs.title: ✅ Named Entity Recognition (NER)
docs.text:
• [ ] Use spaCy / custom NER model to extract:
  • Name, Email, Phone
  • Degrees, Skills, Universities
  • Job Titles, Companies, Duration

docs.title: ✅ Skill Matching
docs.text:
• [ ] Keyword/skill matching against job description
  • [ ] Custom weightage for preferred skills

docs.title: ✅ Candidate Ranking
docs.text:
• [ ] Scoring algorithm based on:
  • Education relevance
  • Experience match
  • Skill overlap
  • [ ] Use ML model (XGBoost / Logistic Regression / BERT scoring)

docs.title: ✅ Output Format
docs.text:
• [ ] Structured JSON
  • [ ] CSV export for bulk analysis
  • [ ] Streamlit or Flask dashboard

docs.title: ✅ UI / API Integration
docs.text:
• [ ] Web interface with file upload
  • [ ] REST API to return parsed resume data

docs.title: ⚙️ Tech Stack
docs.text:
• Python (NLP, Text Parsing)
  • spaCy / BERT / Custom NER
  • Streamlit / Flask
  • MySQL or MongoDB for storage
  • GitHub Actions for CI/CD (planned)

docs.title: 🚀 Future Enhancements
docs.text:
• Support multilingual resumes
  • Add feedback loop to improve model
  • Integrate with ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems)

docs.title: YouTube Video Downloader
docs.text: A fast and flexible desktop tool to download individual videos or full playlists from YouTube in HD.

docs.title: 🎯 Overview
docs.text: This tool allows you to: - Download YouTube videos in 1080p or 720p - Handle entire playlists - Integrate aria2c for ultra-fast downloads - Choose resolution, format, and save location

docs.title: ✅ Basic Downloading
docs.text:
• [ ] Single video download
  • [ ] Playlist download
  • [ ] Show video metadata (title, duration, resolution options)

docs.title: ✅ Resolution & Format
docs.text:
• [ ] 1080p, 720p, 480p options
  • [ ] MP4, WebM, MP3 formats
  • [ ] Audio-only extraction

docs.title: ✅ aria2c Integration
docs.text:
• [ ] Use aria2c for faster multi-connection downloads
  • [ ] Allow fallback to native downloader

docs.title: ✅ GUI Features
docs.text:
• [ ] Streamlit or Tkinter frontend
  • [ ] Progress bar
  • [ ] Download history/log

docs.title: ✅ Batch Mode
docs.text:
• [ ] Accept multiple URLs via file or form
  • [ ] Batch download with status summary

docs.title: 🧰 Tech Stack
docs.text:
• Python
  • pytube / yt-dlp
  • aria2c for speed optimization
  • Streamlit or Tkinter GUI

docs.title: 🛠️ Planned Enhancements
docs.text:
• Automatic video title-based naming
  • Subtitles & metadata support
  • Show estimated download time
  • Schedule downloads

docs.title: 📌 Notes
docs.text: This tool is meant for personal use or for downloading open-licensed content. Avoid violating YouTube's Terms of Service.
